summary: Email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorney and FBI/NYPD regarding discovery materials for the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The AUSA requests various investigative materials including FBI 302s, photographs, search warrant returns, and phone records related to Epstein and Maxwell investigations.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting discovery materials for the Maxwell case from FBI and NYPD.

events.title: Discovery call scheduled
events.description: Planned call between AUSA and FBI/NYPD to discuss discovery materials for the Maxwell case.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Prosecutors were gathering discovery materials for Ghislaine Maxwell's defense in July 2020.
Requested materials include all FBI 302s from searches of Epstein's New York and USVI residences.
Requested materials include all photographs from FBI searches of Epstein's properties.
Requested materials include all phone records for Maxwell including subscriber information, toll records, and GPS data.
The document shows coordination between SDNY prosecutors and FBI/NYPD investigators for the Maxwell case.
